itunes.summary:

itunes.summary:
As science and culture progress into the future, religion can start to feel like obsolete technology. I talk with Atlanta pastor, John Onwuchekwa, about the experience of doubt and what it looks like to carry faith into the future. 

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
